page.title: 17Horses
page.content: Because there are so many horses in our D Block there are lots of stables and fields. This area is a nice area for riding. There are nice wide verges with lots of grass, the roads are usually{quiet}and there are plenty of bridle paths. For some bridle paths you need a pass but most are public. Another thing is the {motorists}are polite. They don't beep their horns or any thing, they usually just drive slowly past you. There are lots of { {local shows}around, and there is a big one each year in Ulcombe which has a lot of different classes such as "Handy pony" "Fancy dress" "Musical poles" "Dressage" "Apple and bucket", "Minimus jumping" "Working hunter" "Bending" and "Clear round jumping."There are dogs in the show too but they have their own classes.
